name: Echo (itch) (Games@MQ)
description:
Echo is a top-down puzzle game where you explore your environment using a visualisation of echolocation.

How to play:
Movement: WASD or arrow keys.
Throw nuts ant bolts: Left mouse click

Objective: Find keys to unlock doors avoiding detection by the different types of enemies.

If you'd like to play the game in browser, you can check out the creators' game page here: https://xxprog4am3rlegtxx6369.itch.io/echo-comp315-group-i-team-stonks. Game works best in Chrome.
